al=['a','e','i','o','u']
s=raw_input()
x=''
i=0
while i<len(s):
    """
    if (i==0 and s[i]=='z') or (i==len(s)-1 and s[i]=='z'):
        x+=s[i]
        i+=1
    elif s[i]=='z':
        if s[i-1] in al and s[i+1]==s[i-1]:
            i+=2
        else:
            x+=s[i]
            i+=1
    else:
        x+=s[i]
        i+=1
    """
    if s[i] in al:
        x+=s[i]
        i+=3
    else:
        x+=s[i]
        i+=1
        
print x
